summary: Completed testing of Brand Campaign Reports page redesign. All features working correctly - demographics charts (donut, bar, circular progress), metrics tab, postulantes tab, and filters. Backend: 20/20 tests passed. Frontend: All UI elements verified.
critical_code_review_comments: BrandCampaignReports.jsx implements professional SVG-based charts (DonutChart, CircularProgress, HorizontalBarChart)
Demographics data correctly aggregated from ugc_metrics collection with demographics field
Gender distribution shows donut chart + circular progress indicators (65% female, 32% male, 3% other)
Age distribution shows horizontal bar chart with gradient colors
Country distribution shows circular progress charts for top 5 countries
Platform and month filters work correctly and trigger API refetch
Postulantes tab correctly shows 'No hay postulantes para mostrar' when no confirmed applications exist
seed_data_creation: Test demographics data was pre-seeded in ugc_metrics collection with demographics field containing gender, age_ranges, and countries data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Brand Campaign Reports page at /ugc/brand/campaigns/{campaign_id}/reports is fully functional. Three tabs: Métricas (metrics summary cards + table), Demografía (gender donut chart, age bar chart, country circular progress), Postulantes (applicants report table). Backend endpoints: GET /api/ugc/metrics/campaign/{id}/detailed, GET /api/ugc/metrics/campaign/{id}/demographics, GET /api/ugc/campaigns/{id}/applicants-report. All require brand authentication.

metrics_tab.details: Summary cards (Views, Alcance, Likes, Compartidos, Tiempo Reproducción) and metrics table with creator data

demographics_gender_chart.details: Donut chart + circular progress indicators showing 65% female, 32% male, 3% other

demographics_country_chart.details: Circular progress charts showing Paraguay (75%), Argentina (15%), Brasil (5%), Chile (3%), Uruguay (2%)

postulantes_tab.details: Shows 'No hay postulantes para mostrar' when no confirmed applications exist

platform_filter.details: Filter options: TikTok + Instagram, Solo Instagram, Solo TikTok

backend_demographics_api.details: Returns gender, age_ranges, countries, has_data flag

backend_metrics_api.details: Returns metrics array with creator info, views, reach, likes, etc.

backend_applicants_api.details: Returns applicants array (empty when no confirmed applications)
